AS3911 interrupt handling. More...

#include <p24Fxxxx.h>
#include "ams_types.h"

Defines

#define AS3911_IRQ_ON()   { _IC1IE = 1; }
 Enable processing of AS3911 interrupts by the PIC.
#define AS3911_IRQ_OFF()   { _IC1IE = 0; }
 Disable processing of AS3911 interrupts by the PIC.
